title: India races to build power plants in region claimed by China, sources say
description: India is investing $1 billion in 12 hydropower stations in Arunachal Pradesh to support the region's infrastructure. The move may impact relations with China due to territorial disputes. Both countries are focusing on improving border infrastructure after recent clashes. Stay informed for further updates.
